body:
I looked into ["Difference between `variable_scope` and `name_scope`](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/34215746/difference-between-variable-scope-and-name-scope-in-tensorflow)  and [this](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/35919020/whats-the-difference-of-name-scope-and-a-variable-scope-in-tensorflow?noredirect=1&lq=1) on StackOverFlow and I think it is not really related to this particular `tf.keras` issue and more about how `Variable` is constructed in tensorflow graph. 

My point is about whether this `tf.keras.layers.*` should get supported from `variable_scope` as `tf.slim.*`, rather than avoiding using it.
